column4: Any problems mixing KDE apps (say kopete) with default Gnome desktop?
no  the proper libs get added as needed ,  just use  add/remove or synaptic to install
maybe the ppl in #networking can help

my mobo just booted from cold at 32°C for the mobo , 10 minutes ago and the temp as been climbing every since it is now at 40°C,  I'm waiting to see if it goes higher,  earlier it was at 43°C when idling,
